title: TDO Jungle/Support Search
body:
TDO is a new League of Legends Team aiming to compete in OOL and culminates in a hopeful place in the OCS.

* Forming in December under the name Take The Lantern, the team placed 5th at NZGC Wildcard.
* In February, we decided to name change for the upcoming OOL and the team took part in Oceania is Best Place with a provisional roster.
* We are looking for either a Jungle OR Support Main Diamond+ (S5) that has; 
              1. a positive work ethic
              2. a large champion pool
              3. understanding of different play styles
              4. voice communication
* We have established scrim partners and are relatively flexible around playing times. 
* It is important to note that current players are involved in University. 
* The team will be actively participating in tournaments as well as the Open Ladder. 

If you have any questions PM In-Game.

replies.body:
Best of luck in the Open Ladder! Was great fun casting you guys for the wildcard and I think with your attitude you can absolutely make it far!

{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:11}}
